data.value: Error in binding managed metadata values. Please make sure these managed metadata terms exist - "JCIBusinessUnit","JCILocation" and "JCICountry". Please contact the Johnson Controls help desk and have them submit a support ticket to the appropriate business unit support team.

data.name: ErrorBindingUserProfile_Text
data.value: Error in mapping user profile properties. Please make sure these custom user profile properties are available- "JCI-BusinessOrg" and "JCI-Country". Please contact the Johnson Controls help desk and have them submit a support ticket to the appropriate business unit support team.
data.comment: Error binding user profile for Site Provisioning UI

data.name: ErrorSiteFeatureConfigurationList_Text
data.value: System cannot find the SiteFeaturesConfiguration list information.It can be either this page has been timed out or Content type hub site is down. Please close the browser and start again and if you still having problem, please contact the Johnson Controls help desk and have them submit a support ticket to the appropriate business unit support team.
data.comment: Time out error or MMS is down

data.name: ErrorSystemAccountUserProfile_Text
data.value: System account does not have the user profile properties. Please login with another user account. Please contact the Johnson Controls help desk and have them submit a support ticket to the appropriate business unit support team.
data.comment: Access issue for accessing User Profile Properties.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_ClarityProjectNumberToolTip_Text
data.value: If this is an IT project please enter the Clarity Project Number. If this is a non-IT project then please enter the related project number for your project.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_Click_Text
data.value: I understand JCI instructions and agree to the terms of use.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_CommunitySiteDescription_LabelText
data.value: Communities are well suited for mass collaboration initiatives, where a large group of users participate in sharing knowledge and learning from other people across organizational and hierarchical boundaries. They are a persistent form of knowledge collection and storage.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_CommunitySiteOptions_HelpText
data.value:
Public: All Johnson Controls employees and contractors will have read access to the site. They can Join the community and begin to contribute immediately. The site will require a Site Moderator.
Private: All Johnson Controls employees and contractors will have read access to the site. They can request to Join the community, and that request will need to be Approved or Rejected by the Site Approver. The site will require a Site Moderator, and a Site Approver.
Secure: Only specified members can view and contribute to the Community. The site will require a Site Moderator.
data.comment: Help text for community site options

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_CommunityToolTip_Text
data.comment: Tool tip to select commuinity type

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_ConfidentialityLevelToolTip_Text
data.value: Select Confidentiality Level as open if this site is available for all users

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_ConfidentialityTypeConfidentialToolTip_Text
data.value: Available to Johnson Control\'s employees, partners and contractors that have authorized access to the Johnson Controls network and have been granted privileges to the information

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_ConfidentialityTypeInternalToolTip_Text
data.value: Available to Johnson Control\'s employees, partners and contractors that have authorized access to the Johnson Controls network
data.comment: Tool tip for internal - confidentiality level

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_ConfidentialityTypePublicToolTip_Text
data.value: Available to the public without any special restrictions
data.comment: Tool tip for internal - public level

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_ConfidentialityTypeRestrictedToolTip_Text
data.value: Available to only those Johnson Control\'s employees, partners and contractors that have be provided highly restrictive distribution/access privileges to the information
data.comment: Tool tip for internal - Private level

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_Confidentiality_HelpText
data.value:
Internal: Available to Johnson Control’s employees, partners, and contractors who have authorized access to the Johnson Controls network. All Johnson Controls employees and contractors will have read access to the site.

Confidential: Available to Johnson Control’s employees, partners, and contractors who have authorized access to the Johnson Controls network and have been granted privileges to the information. Access is restricted so that only JCI Employees and contractors specifically added to the site groups by the site owners or administrators will have access to the site.

Restricted: Same as Confidential, but special care must be taken to ensure data is secured. Site Owners and Administrators must be conscious the site contains sensitive information when granting access to the site, or to information contained within the site.

Partner sites: Access for non-Johnson Control’s employees, partners, and contractors will be available on Partner sites only, and only if specifically added to the site access list, no matter which Confidentiality Level is chosen.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_CountryToolTip_Text
data.comment: Tool tip for the select the country

data.value: End date cannot be before start date

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_EndDateToolTip_Text

data.value: You are about to submit your request.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_HelpClarityProjectNo_HelpText
data.value: If this is an IT project please enter the Clarity Project Number. If this is a non-IT project then please enter the related project number for your project.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_InitialMemberToProvisionToolTip_Text
data.value: Optionally specify Initial Members to Provision. All these users will be added as members with contribute access to the site.
data.comment: Tool tip for intial members provision

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_IsTestSiteToolTip_Text
data.value: Select if the site is for test purpose. The test site will be deleted after 90 days from the date of creation.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_IsTest_HelpText
data.value:
If you do not check this box then this request will go through an approval process before the site is actually created.
You will be notified via email concerning approval, rejection, or if more information is needed.
If you check the box then the site will bypass the approval process and be created that day.
Be aware that this test site WILL BE DELETED after 90 days.
This test site CANNOT be migrated to a permanent site later.
data.comment: Help text for is test site

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_PrivateCommunityToolTip_Text
data.value: Private community. Everyone can view the content of the site, but only members who have approved requests for membership can contribute.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_ProjectSiteDescription_LabelText
data.value: Project sites are well suited for distinct groups of users who are working together on a specific project, although these users might span organizational hierarchies. They generally exist only for the life of a project, and might be discarded or archived when the project is completed.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_PublicCommunityToolTip_Text
data.value: Public community. Everyone can contribute to the community.

data.name: SiteRequestWebPart_TeamSiteDescription_LabelText
data.value: Team sites are well suited for distinct groups of users to collaborate and store information that is common to the team, such as documents and calendars. They are generally used within organizational hierarchies, and generally have more permanence than project sites.
